title: 09/08/21 DPS Hour 3 Kevin Kelley
itunes:title: 09/08/21 DPS Hour 3 Kevin Kelley
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, Presbyterian College head football coach Kevin Kelley chats with Dan about his "no punting" rule as head coach, what things he's done along the way to become successful, and which high-profile coaches have asked for a bit of private football consultation. Also, Dan dissects the perpetual Paul Pierce-LeBron James beef.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
